0: Roof top bar and swimming pool is nice
it is a beautiful hotel with a gorgeous rooftop pool and bar with the best view of the city
The roof bar restaurant pool is quite stunning
Smooth check good indoor parking restaurant and pool on the roof great views
There is only a la card breakfast offered on their really nice roof terrasse
There is a small but pretty rooftop pool which was nice to breakfast by or have a happy hour libation
Wonderful rooftop restaurant bar set around pool with panoramic views
The restaurant party indoors and partly outdoors was nice
Lovely rooftop bar with a spectacular view
1: Food was disappointing pool cleaning equipment left by pool all day and a creepy security guard kicked out a dozen guests 5 minutes after kitchen closed and I had just been brought my dinner
It was incredibly awkward to lay down in the middle of people who were eating their lunches
We stopped another one and he offered us to go to the bar and order drinks
Carpets in hallway especially 6th floor near the rooftop restaurant need replacing or cleaning

Because there are restaurant tables completely surrounding the pool it is extremely awkward for anyone to actually get in the pool because there are people eating all around you and no lounge chairs whatsoever
The rooftop pool actually belongs to the restaurant on the rooftop not the Kimpton
If you do not have a trip planned to stay in LA I would say to check out the roof top bar and lounge at least
Maybe mini bars should be checked prior to checking out
The bar area was so bad I decided to just have a drink and go to my room and order room service
Was not informed they did n’t have a liquor licence and that there was n’t going to be a restaurant when we stayed
